name: .PFO File Extension
summary: Learn about .PFO files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A PFO file is a locked private folder created in the Private Folder (PFO) format, an open format developed by Pismo Technic. It stores a folder that contains sensitive and private data files and applications. PFO files are encrypted and password protected.

content: PFO files are primarily associated with the Pismo File Mount Audit Package. It features a ZIP reader, CD/DVD image reader, .CFS reader, integration with Windows Explorer, and a command line interface.
A PFO file is a container file similar to the .ZIP and .ISO archives. Technically, it is a locked folder saved in the PFO format. When it is unlocked it is a normal file system folder.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
